docs.snippet: Alex Rodriguez sued Major League Baseball and its players' union Monday, seeking to overturn a season-long suspension imposed by an arbitrator who ruled there was "clear and convincing evidence" the New York Yankees star used three banned substanc...
docs.lead_paragraph: Alex Rodriguez sued Major League Baseball and its players' union Monday, seeking to overturn a season-long suspension imposed by an arbitrator who ruled there was "clear and convincing evidence" the New York Yankees star used three banned substances and twice tried to obstruct the sport's drug investigation.

headline.main: A-Rod Sues MLB, Union to Overturn Drug Ban
headline.print_headline: A-Rod Sues MLB, Union to Overturn Drug Ban

docs.snippet: After competing for 25 years in Europe, changing clubs 15 times and living in five countries, Darryl Middleton has advice, a lot of it, to pass along to American players considering a tour abroad....
docs.lead_paragraph: After competing for 25 years in Europe, changing clubs 15 times and living in five countries, Darryl Middleton has advice, a lot of it, to pass along to American players considering a tour abroad.
docs.abstract: Professional basketball player Darryl Middleton, who has competed for 15 clubs over 25 years in Europe, offers advice to talented young American players who are considering a tour abroad.

headline.main: The Basketball Player’s Guide to the (European) Galaxy
headline.print_headline: The Basketball Player’s Guide to the (European) Galaxy
